description: Recently, our decision to appoint a young and popular newcomer to a key government position has sparked off dissent within the party. Old party members feel sidelined as they believe their years of loyalty and service have been overlooked.

options.description: Tough luck, guys. We need fresh faces!
Well, we've stirred the pot. Let's make amends and promise to involve seniors in key decisions!
On reflection, this has caused more harm than good. Let's back out of the decision.

title: Newcomer?!
